title: Starter Template
intro: This is a starter template page. You can customize it in the admin panel.
body:
## Welcome to your custom page

This page is fully customizable. You can edit the following elements:

- Page title
- Intro text
- Main content (supports Markdown)
- Call-to-action button

### How to customize

1. Log in to the admin panel
2. Go to 'Page Templates'
3. Edit the 'starter' template or create a new one
4. Preview your changes and publish

![Car](https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1492144534655-ae79c964c9d7?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1350&q=80)

developerSettings.warning: ⚠️ Only advanced users should touch this. Changing anything here may break the page layout.
